statements: SELECT * FROM search_engine_content;
SELECT id, text_content FROM search_engine_content ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, text_content FROM search_engine_content WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM search_engine_content WHERE text_content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT text_content, created_at FROM search_engine_content ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM search_engine_content WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT text_content FROM search_engine_content WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT id, text_content FROM search_engine_content WHERE text_content LIKE '%database%'
SELECT * FROM search_engine_content WHERE text_content LIKE '%example%' AND created_at > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, created_at FROM search_engine_content ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT doc_id, title FROM documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE title LIKE 'A%';
SELECT doc_id, title, content FROM documents WHERE doc_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT keyword, doc_id FROM search_index ORDER BY keyword DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM documents ORDER BY doc_id DESC;
SELECT title FROM documents WHERE title LIKE '%important%' AND content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM search_index JOIN documents ON search_index.doc_id = documents.doc_id WHERE search_index.keyword = 'database';
SELECT doc_id, title FROM documents WHERE doc_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM content_data;
SELECT content FROM content_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, keyword FROM keywords ORDER BY keyword DESC;
SELECT content_id, COUNT(keyword_id) AS keyword_count FROM content_keywords GROUP BY content_id;
SELECT content_data.id, content, keyword FROM content_data LEFT JOIN content_keywords ON content_data.id = content_id LEFT JOIN keywords ON keyword_id = keywords.id;
SELECT * FROM content_data;
SELECT id, content FROM content_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT content_data.content, keywords.keyword FROM content_data JOIN content_keywords ON content_data.id = content_keywords.content_id JOIN keywords ON content_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.id;

SELECT content_data.content, COUNT(content_keywords.keyword_id) AS keyword_count FROM content_data JOIN content_keywords ON content_data.id = content_keywords.content_id GROUP BY content_data.content;
SELECT * FROM content_data WHERE content ILIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content FROM documents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM words WHERE word = 'Example';
SELECT id, word FROM words ORDER BY word ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(word_id) FROM word_occurrences GROUP BY document_id HAVING COUNT(word_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content FROM documents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT document_id, COUNT(*) as occurrence_count FROM word_occurrences GROUP BY document_id ORDER BY occurrence_count DESC;
SELECT word FROM words WHERE word LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT d.id, w.word FROM documents d INNER JOIN words w ON d.content LIKE '%' || w.word || '%' ORDER BY d.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, title FROM documents WHERE title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT document_id, title, content FROM documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT search_id, query, search_time FROM search_history WHERE search_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT content FROM documents WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT query, search_time FROM search_history ORDER BY search_time DESC;
SELECT title, content, relevance FROM documents JOIN search_results ON documents.document_id = search_results.document_id WHERE relevance > 0.8;
